title: Methodological considerations for semialgebraic hypothesis testing with incomplete U-statistics
excerpt: This paper discusses methodological considerations for semialgebraic hypothesis testing with incomplete U-statistics.
citation: Barnhill, D., Garrote-López, M., Gross, E., Hill, M., Kagy, B., Rhodes, J. A., & Zhang, J. Z. (2025). "Methodological considerations for semialgebraic hypothesis testing with incomplete U-statistics." arXiv preprint arXiv:2507.13531.

title: Bayesian phylodynamic inference of population dynamics with dormancy
venue: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
excerpt: This paper introduces a Bayesian framework for inferring population dynamics that account for dormancy.
citation: Cappello, L., Lo, W. T., Zhang, J. Z., Xu, P., Barrow, D., Chopra, I., Clark, A. G., Wells, M. T., & Kim, J. (2025). "Bayesian phylodynamic inference of population dynamics with dormancy." Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, 122(18).

title: Admixed populations in the neighbor-joining algorithm: a geometric analysis with five taxa
excerpt: This paper provides a geometric analysis of admixed populations in the neighbor-joining algorithm for phylogenetic tree reconstruction.
citation: Zhang, J. Z., Lo, W. T., Stillman, M., & Kim, J. (2024). "Admixed populations in the neighbor-joining algorithm: a geometric analysis with five taxa." bioRxiv.

title: Friezes over ℤ[√2]
excerpt: This paper explores mathematical frieze patterns over the ring of integers ℤ[√2].
citation: Banaian, E., Farrell, L., Tao, A., Wright, K., & Zhang, J. Z. (2025). "Friezes over ℤ[√2]." Involve, a Journal of Mathematics, 18(4), 683-705.

title: Topology of augmented Bergman complexes
excerpt: This paper examines the topological properties of augmented Bergman complexes.
citation: Bullock, E., Kelley, A., Reiner, V., Ren, K., Shemy, G., Shen, D., Sun, B., Tao, A., & Zhang, Z. J. (2021). "Topology of augmented Bergman complexes." The Electronic Journal of Combinatorics.

title: Frobenius templates in certain 2x2 matrix rings
venue: International Journal of Mathematics and Computer Science
excerpt: This paper investigates Frobenius templates within specific rings of 2x2 matrices.
citation: Eller, T., Kraus, J., Takahashi, Y., & Zhang, Z. J. (2022). "Frobenius templates in certain 2x2 matrix rings." International Journal of Mathematics and Computer Science, 17(2).

title: Graphs with prescribed radius, diameter, and center
venue: International Journal of Mathematics and Computer Science
excerpt: This paper studies the construction and properties of graphs with specific constraints on their radius, diameter, and center.
citation: Guest, K., Johnson, A., Johnson, P., Jones, W., Takahashi, Y., & Zhang, Z. J. (2021). "Graphs with prescribed radius, diameter, and center." International Journal of Mathematics and Computer Science.
